Reasons for GRADE if not High: Single study at high risk of bias
Single study at high risk of bias

Three studies at high risk of bias, three unclear. Two studies were industry?sponsored, whilst in three studies the source of funding was not declared.
Heterogeneity I2 = 85%, P value < 0.001.
